entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
